Html: I'm working on a project that involves importing (and later exporting) XLS files. I might need to dive in and produce some patches to PHPExcel in the process. What reference are you using for the file format?

You can find details of the MS Office BIFF file formats in the microsoft.com library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc313105%28v=office.12%29.aspx which is the reference I use for most work with xls.
Thanks. I thought we were still at the era of reverse-engineering the XLS format :-)

kratib wrote:

Thanks. I thought we were still at the era of reverse-engineering the XLS format :-)


Not for the last couple of years, thank heavens.
